channel.title: AOL on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in AOL on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: AOL announces September shutdown for dial-up Internet after 34 years
item.description: Around 175,000 households still use dial-up Internet in the US.

item.title: AOL Dial-Up Internet Service to End After 34 Years
item.description: AOL will officially discontinue its dial-up internet service on September 30, pulling the plug on an era that defined early internet access for millions of Americans. Image credit: Retrohead The Yahoo

item.title: AOL Dial-Up Internet Service to End After 34 Years
item.description: AOL will officially discontinue its dial-up internet service on September 30, pulling the plug on an era that defined early internet access for millions of Americans. Image credit: Retrohead The Yahoo
